title: Ep 78: Just Dance with Elizabeth Gilbert
itunes:title: Ep 78: Just Dance with Elizabeth Gilbert
itunes:subtitle: Kate and Doree discuss the value of small talk and creaming one’s bod, celebrate some big accomplishments, and try out vegetarian recipes. Then they welcome New York Times best-selling author Elizabeth Gilbert. She discusses dancing every day as self-c...
description:
Kate and Doree discuss the value of small talk and creaming one’s bod, celebrate some big accomplishments, and try out vegetarian recipes. Then they welcome New York Times best-selling author Elizabeth Gilbert. She discusses dancing every day as self-care, writing City of Girls while grieving the loss of her partner, and encouraging people to reframe the narrative of fear and harness their creativity.


To leave a voicemail for a future mini-ep, call 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
